cMissionDefinition Day2Jump
{
	DebugSpawnPoint = "Start"
	DescriptionSummary = "110"
	DisplayName = "110"
	Duration = "300"
	LevelToStartAtIfDebuggingMission = "SAFEHOUSE"
	MissionType = "3"
	Module = "0"
	REMOVE_BEFORE_SHIP = "true"
	ShowInDebugMenu = "true"
	StartTime = "86400"
	cMissionObjective Day1Jump-Objective1
	{
		cMissionObjectiveEvent Day1StartedEnd1
		{
			EventString = "Day2Started"
		}

	}

	cMissionOnEnter StartDay2
	{
		cMissionSendEvent Day1Started1
		{
			Value = "Day2Started"
		}

		cMissionSetChuckState GiveKeystoUnderground
		{
			ChuckState = "20"
			Value = "85017"
		}

		cMissionSendEvent EnableItems3
		{
			Value = "FirstLooterDialogue"
		}

		cMissionSendEvent EndMission17
		{
			Value = "EndPawnMission"
		}

	}

}

cMissionDefinition Day3Jump
{
	DebugSpawnPoint = "Start"
	DescriptionSummary = "110"
	DisplayName = "110"
	Duration = "300"
	LevelToStartAtIfDebuggingMission = "SAFEHOUSE"
	MissionType = "3"
	Module = "0"
	REMOVE_BEFORE_SHIP = "true"
	ShowInDebugMenu = "true"
	StartTime = "172800"
	cMissionObjective Day1Jump-Objective2
	{
		cMissionObjectiveEvent Day1StartedEnd2
		{
			EventString = "Day3Started"
		}

	}

	cMissionOnEnter StartDay3
	{
		cMissionSendEvent Day1Started2
		{
			Value = "Day3Started"
		}

		cMissionSetChuckState GiveKeystoUnderground1
		{
			ChuckState = "20"
			Value = "85017"
		}

		cMissionSendEvent EnableItems4
		{
			Value = "FirstLooterDialogue"
		}

		cMissionSendEvent EndMission18
		{
			Value = "EndPawnMission"
		}

	}

}

cMissionDefinition Day4Jump
{
	DebugSpawnPoint = "Start"
	DescriptionSummary = "110"
	DisplayName = "110"
	Duration = "300"
	LevelToStartAtIfDebuggingMission = "SAFEHOUSE"
	MissionType = "3"
	Module = "0"
	REMOVE_BEFORE_SHIP = "true"
	ShowInDebugMenu = "true"
	StartTime = "259200"
	cMissionObjective Day1Jump-Objective3
	{
		cMissionObjectiveEvent Day1StartedEnd3
		{
			EventString = "Day4Started"
		}

	}

	cMissionOnEnter StartDay4
	{
		cMissionSendEvent Day1Started3
		{
			Value = "Day4Started"
		}

		cMissionSetChuckState GiveKeystoUnderground2
		{
			ChuckState = "20"
			Value = "85017"
		}

		cMissionSendEvent EnableItems5
		{
			Value = "FirstLooterDialogue"
		}

		cMissionSendEvent EndMission19
		{
			Value = "EndPawnMission"
		}

	}

}

cMissionDefinition PawnShop_1
{
	Duration = "518400"

	cMissionObjective Day2Start
	{
		cMissionObjectiveEvent Day2start
		{
			EventString = "PawnDay2"
		}

	}

	cMissionOnEnter PawnShop_1-Start

			{
				AutoStart = "false"

				Dialogue0 = "65618"
				JoinChuckAfter = "true"
